name: Scouttasturvat: Moped dismount
description:
Scouttasturvat is my entry for the TF2maps 2019 72h jam!

It's some sort of tribute to a game I really enjoyed years ago, Porrasturvat.
In Porrasturvat, you had to push someone down some stairs and hurt them as much as possible. Scouttasturvat is the same, but with Scout and his Scooty Scoot!

Move with WASD/arrow keys, and go in ragdoll mode with Space.
Get hurt as much as you can, and get some cool high score!

TF2 is property of Valve.
All the models, textures, animations and sounds are owned by Valve.

Music by Melissotarsus.
